title: Dell security advisory (AV25-235)
description: Between April 21 and 27, 2025, Dell published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in multiple products. Included were updates for the following products:
products: Dell APEX Cloud Platform for Red Hat OpenShift  versions prior to 03.02.04.00
Dell PowerProtect Data Manager  versions 19.15.0 to 19.18.0-23
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
